__TOC__

The Irish team will participate in the 09 UbuntuGlobalJam on the weekend of 2-4th October 2009.

The Irish events will be on Sat 3rd and Sun 4th.  The tentative plan is to divide the focus as follows:

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Day
| Topics
|-
| Sat 3rd
| <nowiki>[[Jams-Bugs|Bugs]]</nowiki>, Testing
|-
| Sun 4th
| Docs, <nowiki>[[Jams-Translations|Translations]]</nowiki>
|}
